meaning: Things not going smoothly; feeling frustrated
description: "Shunqi" means "in a pleasant state (without going against one's will)".

examples.chinese: 我遇见不顺气的事就开始听歌发泄
examples.translation: When things don't go my way, I listen to music to vent.

examples.chinese: 哇操,不发个脾气真是不顺气
examples.translation: Damn, I really won't feel better unless I lose my temper.

examples.chinese: 上周开始水逆了,心情暴差,不顺气
examples.translation: Mercury retrograde started last week, my mood is terrible, everything is frustrating.
